backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing chat sessions, user profiles, access control, and generating Puro responses with simple escape detection and pseudo‑random outcomes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that loads the user profile and shows either the setup modal or the chat page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input with Enter‑to‑send, action detection via trailing asterisk, and a send button.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Renders chat history or an empty-state prompt inviting the user to start chatting.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Displays individual messages with styling differences for Puro, user, and action types.
Circular avatar component showing Puro's image in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/ChatLayou: Page layout with header, footer, Puro branding, and share links.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting the user for their display name before entering the chat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestSessionId.ts: React hook returning a memoized guest session ID stored via getOrCreateGuestSessionId.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading/saving user profiles and chat history and sending messages, using identity or guest session IDs.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and InternetIdentityProvider around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat page handling message history display, sending messages, and UI state like loading and errors.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Utility to generate, store, retrieve, and clear guest session IDs using localStorage with UUID fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with theme extensions, color variables, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state for an AI roleplay chat app where the assistant fully roleplays as Puro, including architectural notes and existing features. Lists requirements for in-character behavior, action parsing, frontend UI, theming, and avatar assets.
